headlines.headline: Bulls' mascot picks new number after Rose's jersey retirement
headlines.description: Benny the Bull had worn No. 1 since 1969. In honor of Derrick Rose's jersey retirement, the beloved mascot decided to enter a new era.

headlines.description: The Pro Bowl Games offer a fun opportunity for NFL players to shine outside of traditional games. Check out all-time event records now.

headlines.headline: The Miz goes on epic rant over the Cleveland Browns

headlines.headline: Graziano praises the 'common sense' of Seahawks in roster-building

headlines.headline: Why Saturday finds Steelers hiring Mike McCarthy 'confusing'

headlines.headline: Saturday: Drake Maye doesn't have to be a hero to win Super Bowl
headlines.description: Jeff Saturday says Drake Maye can lean on his teammates and coaching staff to help lead the Patriots to victory in Super Bowl LX.

headlines.headline: The secrets to the Colorado Avalanche's NHL dominance
headlines.description: Colorado is flirting with NHL records for team performance. We dive deep on the NHL's most dominant team.
